      • doRestartAdmin

        public static void doRestartAdmin​(java.lang.String principal,
                                  java.lang.String domainUID)
        Restarts the admin server, if already running
        Parameters:
        principal - Service principal
        domainUID - Domain UID

      • doRollingRestartServers

        public static void doRollingRestartServers​(java.lang.String principal,
                                           java.lang.String domainUID,
                                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> servers)
        Restarts the listed servers, if already running. Singleton servers will be immediately restarted. Clustered servers will be rolled so that the cluster maintains minimal availability, if possible.
        Parameters:
        principal - Service principal
        domainUID - Domain UID
        servers - Servers to roll

      • doRollingRestartClusters

        public static void doRollingRestartClusters​(java.lang.String principal,
                                            java.lang.String domainUID,
                                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> clusters)
        Restarts the listed clusters, if member servers are running. Member servers will be restarted in a rolling fashion in order to maintain minimal availability, if possible.
        Parameters:
        principal - Service principal
        domainUID - Domain UID
        clusters - Clusters to roll

      • getStopping

        public static boolean getStopping​()
        True, if the operator is stopping
        Returns:
        Is operator stopping
